MENU.DESC: It’s easy to start hosting and earn extra income.

PROFILEPAGE.PROFILEDESC: Your Staygenx profile is an important part of every reservation. Create yours to help other hosts and guests get to know you.

PersonalInfoHelp.WHY_INFO_HIDDEN_TITLE: Why isn’t my info shown here?
PersonalInfoHelp.WHY_INFO_HIDDEN_DESC: We’re hiding some account details to protect your identity.
PersonalInfoHelp.EDITABLE_DETAILS_DESC: Contact info and personal details can be edited. If this info was used to verify your identity, you’ll need to get verified again the next time you book – or to continue hosting.
PersonalInfoHelp.SHARED_INFO_TITLE: What info is shared with others?
PersonalInfoHelp.SHARED_INFO_DESC: Staygenx only releases contact information for Hosts and guests after a reservation is confirmed.

STEP1.TITLE: Tell us about your place
STEP1.DESC: Share some basic info, such as where it is and how many guests can stay.

STEP2.TITLE: Make it stand out
STEP2.DESC: Add 5 or more photos plus a title and description – we’ll help you out.

STEP3.TITLE: Finish up and publish
STEP3.DESC: Choose a starting price, verify a few details, then publish your listing.

ABOUTYOURPLACE.TITLE: Tell us about your place
ABOUTYOURPLACE.DESC: In this step, we'll ask you which type of property you have and if guests will book the entire place or just a room. Then let us know the location and how many guests can stay.

STRUCTURE.HEADER: Which of these best describes your place?

PRIVACYTYPE.HEADER: What type of place will guests have?

LOCATION.DESC: Your address is only shared with guests after they've made a reservation.

FLOORPLAN.HEADER: Share some basics about your place
FLOORPLAN.DESC: You'll add more details later, such as bed types.

SANDOUT.TITLE: Make your place stand out
SANDOUT.DESC: In this step, you'll add some of the amenities your place offers, plus 5 or more photos. Then you’ll create a title and description.

AMENITIES.TITLE: Tell guests what your place has to offer
AMENITIES.DESC: You can add more amenities after you publish your listing.
AMENITIES.HEADING: What about these guest favourites?

PHOTOS.TITLE: Add some photos of your container
PHOTOS.DESC: You'll need 5 photos to get started. You can add more or make changes later.

TITLE.HEADER: Now, let's give your container a title
TITLE.DESC: Short titles work best. Have fun with it – you can always change it later.

DESCRIPTION.DESC: Share what makes your place special.

FINISHSETUP.TITLE: Finish up and publish
FINISHSETUP.DESC: Finally, you'll choose booking settings, set up pricing and publish your listing.

INSTANTBOOK.TITLE: Pick your booking settings
INSTANTBOOK.DESC: You can change this at any time.
INSTANTBOOK.PARA: Start by reviewing reservation requests, then switch to Instant Book so guests can book automatically.

PRICE.TITLE: Now, set a weekday base price

WEEKENDPRICE.TITLE: Set a weekend price
WEEKENDPRICE.DESC1: Add a premium for Fridays and Saturdays.

CREATE.TITLE: Share safety details
CREATE.DESC1: Does your place have any of these?
CREATE.DESC2: Security cameras that monitor indoor spaces are not allowed even if they’re turned off. All exterior security cameras must be disclosed.
CREATE.PARA: Be sure to comply with your local laws and review Staygenx's

TODAYPAGE.NORESERVATION_UPCOMING: You don’t have any upcoming reservations

EDITLISTING.TITLE: Title
EDITLISTING.COMPLETE_REQUIRED_DESCRIPTION: Finish these final tasks to publish your listing and start getting booked.
EDITLISTING.PHOTO_TOUR_ROOM_SUBTITLE: Manage photos and add details. Guests will only see your tour if every room has a photo.
